data.title: Joybird adds new AR tool to its mobile app
data.description: At least 70% of Joybird’s web traffic comes from mobile devices, according to Gerardo Ornelas, the brand’s vice president and general manager. Recognizing the trend, Joybird seized on the opportunity to better serve its online shoppers with the new mobile functionality, he said.

data.title: JobNimbus secures $330 million investment and a new distributor
data.description: JobNimbus and Sumeru plan to continue investments in product development and strategic partnerships as part of a broader effort to modernize tools for contractors across the construction industry.

data.title: Grainger eyes growth through data, technology, and AI
data.description: A key area of focus for Grainger moving forward is the expansion of artificial intelligence (AI) applications

data.title: Formica launches ecommerce platform and access to 1,000 laminate designs
data.description: Users can track orders, save project details, and reference previous samples, streamlining the ordering process for multiple projects.

data.title: Bassett Furniture bets big on ecommerce for recovery amid sales slumps
data.description: The company has already made strides in its digital transformation, overhauling its e-commerce site in late 2023 with improvements such as faster site search and better personalization.
